name: Unknown
appearance: A young woman of indeterminate background, travel-worn and tired, with signs of long-distance journeying and emotional strain.
personality: Determined, anxious, and persistent; driven by guilt and familial attachment, yet unaware of the true cosmic horror surrounding her investigation.
background: An unnamed woman who died the previous year at the Paradil Hotel. She was not a local resident of Cassandra, so no missing person report exists. She came to Cassandra to investigate the disappearance of her younger sister, who ran away from home. Evidence indicates that her sister’s last known destination was Cassandra.
goals: Uncover the truth behind her sister’s disappearance
secrets: Her sister had already been sacrificed to Shub-Niggurath a year earlier
Her own death at the Paradil Hotel was never properly identified or investigated

clues.clueText: Her sister’s final journey ended in Cassandra and she was never seen again afterward.
Her sister had already been sacrificed to Shub-Niggurath one year before her arrival.

relationships.description: Her younger sister who ran away from home and disappeared.
relationships.history: She traveled to Cassandra solely to find her sister, unaware that the cult had already sacrificed her.

notes: Listed in the scenario as “Unknow – last year’s unidentified deceased at the Paradil Hotel.” Her story serves as a tragic foreshadowing of the cult’s activities.
